text:
Park Row, south from Chatham Square, showing the street level overshadowed by the City Hall division of the 2nd and 3rd Avenue "El" line. In the background are the Municipal and Federal Court House buildings. The photographer's vantage point is the platform of the South Ferry division on New Bowery.

1938-9

Alexander Alland

This photo is one of a series that appeared in the published volume "Portrait of N. Y." by Felix Reisenberg and Alex. Alland, IRGV.
title: Manhattan: Park Row - Chatham Square
